data.title: Past Celebrities
data.meta_description: 2024 ​Queen: Joy Elizabeth Berlanga (Daughter of Tyne Vance Berlanga, Queen Shenandoah in 2001 and Granddaughter of Susan Ford Bales, Queen Shenandoah 1975) Grand Marshal: John Huertas...
data.text:
2024-2020

2024

​Queen: Joy Elizabeth Berlanga (Daughter of Tyne Vance Berlanga, Queen Shenandoah in 2001 and Granddaughter of Susan Ford Bales, Queen Shenandoah 1975)

Grand Marshal: John Huertas

Firefighters' Marshal: Huntley, Winner of Seaston 24 of the Voice

Sports Marshal: Archie Manning

Kids' Marshal: Snoopy

Honorary Grand Marshal: Barry Lee

Miss Apple Blossom Festival: Madison Marchant

Miss Apple Blossom Festival Teen: Caty Jewell

​Celebrities and Guests: Rocky Bleier, Brenda Frese, Efren Ramirez, Jas Boothe, Rita McClenny, Miss Virginia Katie Rose, Miss Virginia Association of Fairs, Kara Dixon, Stephanie Stuckey, Ryan Dobson,

Sports Breakfast Hall of Fame Inductees: Jimmy Omps and Chris Garber

2023

​Queen: Isabella Louise Astin (Daughter of Sean Astin)

Grand Marshal: Kate Flannery and Brian Sullivan

Honorary Grand Marshals: Nick and Kathy Nerangis

Miss Apple Blossom Festival: Amanda Short

Miss Apple Blossom Festival Outstanding Teen: Gracie Clark

​Celebrities: Gary Clark, Noah Thompson, Hunter Girl, Kellye Cash, Elizabeth Lynch, Miss Virginia Victoria Chauah, Miss Virginia Association of Fairs Natalie Woodward, Pete Davis

Sports Breakfast Hall of Fame Inductees: Debby Sanders and Jim Casey
